function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 outbreak and its impact on global healthcare systems","Impact":"Detrimental effect on global healthcare systems and ripple effect on every aspect of human life","Mitigation":"Vaccination, testing, contact tracing, and healthcare infrastructure improvement","Technologies":"Vaccines, testing kits, contact tracing apps, telemedicine","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Enforced border shutdowns, travel restrictions, and quarantine","Impact":"Disruption of international travel and trade, economic crisis, and recession fears","Mitigation":"Gradual reopening, implementation of strict health protocols, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Health screening tools, vaccination passports, and travel tracking apps","People":"Travelers, businesses, international agencies","Owner":"Governments, international health organizations, travel industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Global crash in demand for agricultural commodities","Impact":"20% drop in prices of agricultural commodities, economic strain on farmers and agricultural industry","Mitigation":"Diversification of markets, government support programs, and investment in technology","Technologies":"Market analysis tools, digital farming platforms, and supply chain management systems","People":"Farmers, agricultural workers, food supply chain stakeholders","Owner":"Agricultural organizations, governments, technology providers"}]}
